answers.author: Catherine Dallaire
answers.text:
Hi, we carried out a Service Review process during the past year, here is our RFP. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would laso like to receive the final report.
Catherine

answers.author: Edward Everett
answers.text:
Hi Pam
You might tell them to contact the Center for Priority Based Budgeting.  I have meet these guys and they seem very legit.  It is not rocket science and maybe I could help them figure out what they want.   Thanks Ed

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for examples of RFP's and/or scope of work for consulting assistance to conduct a Core Service Review in concert with staff.  The objective is to determine and rank opportunities for service and program elimination, outsourcing, etc.    
Please forward your RFPs or related information/documents.  Your time and expertise is appreciated!  
Pam Muse  
Western Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation  
888-468-6450  
pmuse@tranfromgov.org
title: Core Service Review RFPs
